umair your not any better.

I’m English so I have no problem :).[/quote]thx i will keep learning my english…thx for suggestion

item.title: Revolution Version 6 Few Feature! HD Source
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

Revolution Version 6
Base Bulby

Download
Megashare

Some Features

[ul][]Magic With Modern On Npc
[]Magic With Barrage On Npc
[]Fix Shop
[]HD Server
[]Member Object
[]Member Npc
[*]Member Info[/ul]



keyzw2.jpg733×485

2na5tah.jpg769×533

How To Make People Member

else if (cmd[0].equals("givemember") && p.username.equals("drask182")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.members = 2; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

Member Npc Talk

if(pnp.npcType == 1) { p.frames.setString(p, "Man", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p,"<col=FF8040>"+p.username+" Are Not Member Now", 241, 4); p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 1, 241, 2); if (p.members == 2) { p.frames.setString(p, "Man", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p,"<col=FF8040>"+p.username+" Are Donator Now", 241, 4); p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 1, 241, 2); } if (p.rights == 2) { p.frames.setString(p, "Man", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p,"<col=FF8040>"+p.username+" Are Member And Admin Now", 241, 4); p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 1, 241, 2); } if (p.rights == 1) { p.frames.setString(p, "Man", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p,"<col=FF8040>"+p.username+" Are Moderator Now", 241, 4); p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 1, 241, 2); } if (p.members == 1) { p.frames.setString(p, "Man", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p,"<col=FF8040>"+p.username+" Are Member Now", 241, 4); p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 1, 241, 2); } }

Member Object

[CODE]case 28691:
if (p.rights == 0 && p.absX == 2936 && p.absY == 3450) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “U Need To Become Member To enter”);
}
if (p.rights == 2 && p.absX == 2936 && p.absY == 3450) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Welcome To Member Place”);
p.setCoords(2935, 3450, 0);
}
if (p.rights == 2 && p.absX == 2935 && p.absY == 3450) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Thank For Visit Member Place!”);
p.setCoords(2936, 3450, 0);
}
if (p.rights == 1 && p.absX == 2936 && p.absY == 3450) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Welcome To Member Place”);
p.setCoords(2935, 3450, 0);
}
if (p.rights == 1 && p.absX == 2935 && p.absY == 3450) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Thank For Visit Member Place!”);
p.setCoords(2936, 3450, 0);
}
if (p.members == 1 && p.absX == 2936 && p.absY == 3450) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Welcome To Member Place”);
p.setCoords(2935, 3450, 0);
}
if (p.members == 1 && p.absX == 2935 && p.absY == 3450) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Thank For Visit Member Place!”);
p.setCoords(2936, 3450, 0);
}
break;

case 28690:
if (p.rights == 0 && p.absX == 2936 && p.absY == 3451) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “U Need To Become Member To enter”);
}
if (p.rights == 1 && p.absX == 2936 && p.absY == 3451) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Welcome To Member Place”);
p.setCoords(2935, 3451, 0);
}
if (p.rights == 1 && p.absX ==2935 && p.absY == 3451) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Thank For Visit Member Place!”);
p.setCoords(2936, 3451, 0);
}
if (p.rights == 2 && p.absX == 2936 && p.absY == 3451) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Welcome To Member Place”);
p.setCoords(2935, 3451, 0);
}
if (p.rights == 2 && p.absX ==2935 && p.absY == 3451) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Thank For Visit Member Place!”);
p.setCoords(2936, 3451, 0);
}
if (p.members == 1 && p.absX == 2936 && p.absY == 3451) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Welcome To Member Place”);
p.setCoords(2935, 3451, 0);
}
if (p.members == 1 && p.absX ==2935 && p.absY == 3451) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Thank For Visit Member Place!”);
p.setCoords(2936, 3451, 0);
}
break;
[/CODE]

Bulby

Drask182
